title: News24.com | Coronavirus lockdown: KZN education department to use radio classes to help matric pupils
description: As a national lockdown looms, the KwaZulu-Natal Department of Education will be assisting matric pupils by hosting radio tuition on its community radio stations.
content:
As a national lockdown looms, the KwaZulu-Natal Department of Education will be assisting matric pupils by hosting radio tuition on its community radio stations.
"We had to respond to how learners can continue to receive tuition while at home. One of the imm… [+2046 chars]
